name: Doki Doki Ninjin 🥕— Postjam Version
description:
Doki Doki Ninjin 🐇🥕

Today is Harvest Day and it is so exciting ! Everyone is gathering vegetables and fruits and selling them at East City. You're attending it and you want to surprise everyone by bringing Golden Carrots !!!

You can consider this version as a demo as we intend to make a full version of DOKI DOKI NINJIN.

Jam Version 

Doki Doki Ninjin - Ludum Dare redirect

Controls Input Actions [ ← ] Move Left [ → ] Move Right [  ↑  ] Jump [  ↓  ] Harvest a plant / Throw a plant [ X ]Go through a door[ Enter ] Confirm choice / Start

Original music by https://www.instagram.com/collinemusique/
